title: Adobe After Effects CC 12.2.1 LS20 Multilingual Update Only Dedi
description:
Adobe After Effects CC 12.2.1 LS20 Multilingual Update Only






Get powerful new features like a Live 3D Pipeline that brings CINEMA 4D scenes in as layers Ã¢â‚¬â€ without intermediate rendering. Share work directly from within the application and get access to new features the moment they're released. Your entire creative world, together in one place.

Live 3D Pipeline
Objects and scenes from popular 3D modeling and animation software CINEMA 4D can be used directly as footage inside After Effects CC without rendering first. This eases roundtripping between the programs and opens up numerous creative possibilities.

Refine Edge tool
It's the end of hard matte lines. Keep the details when separating complicated foreground elements like frizzy hair or motion-blurred edges from complex backgrounds. This means you can create natural-looking composites without keying specially shot footage.

Warp Stabilizer VFX
A major upgrade to the much-loved Warp Stabilizer, VFX adds the ability to choose which objects within a scene get stabilized, reverse a stabilization, and preserve a sceneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s original scale to fix tricky shots such as aerial fly-throughs.

3D Camera Tracker
The 3D Camera Tracker makes it possible to reproduce the original camera movement in a scene so you can add new layers Ã¢â‚¬â€ including video and text layers. It also now features much-requested Track Optimization, so you can refine tracking points over time.

Global Performance Cache
Create more in less time, even in high-resolution projects. With Global Performance Cache, your previews are saved and ready when you are, even if you close a project and open it later. Duplicate compositions and undo edits without waiting for After Effects to catch up.

Optimized and accelerated
Inspiration doesn't like to wait. That's why After Effects crunches pixels using multiple processors and has improved support for NVIDIA GPUs. It's a full 64-bit application that uses all the RAM your OS allows, for caches and to render multiple frames simultaneously.



New Features in 12.2:

* Auto-save enabled by default
* file name and location templates, plus automatic creation of folders for image sequences
* settings migration
* snapping improvements: shape layers, cameras, and lights
* option for creating shape layers based on Bezier paths
* command for converting a parametric shape layer path to a Bezier path
* new version of OptiX library and new behavior of OptiX library loading and initialization
* plus many miscellaneous new and changed features and bug fixes, detailed below

IntelÃ‚Â® CoreÃ¢â€žÂ¢2 Duo or AMD PhenomÃ‚Â® II processor; 64-bit support required
MicrosoftÃ‚Â® WindowsÃ‚Â® 7 with Service Pack 1 (64 bit), Windows 8, or Windows 8 Pro
4GB of RAM (8GB recommended)
5GB of available hard-disk space; additional free space required during installation (cannot install on removable flash storage devices)
Additional disk space for disk cache (10GB recommended)
1280x900 display
OpenGL 2.0Ã¢â‚¬â€œcapable system
QuickTime 7.6.6 software required for QuickTime features
Optional: Adobe-certified GPU card for GPU-accelerated ray-traced 3D renderer
Internet connection and registration are necessary for required software activation, membership validation, and access to online services.*







INSTALLATION:


    Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Next open the .rar file by double clicking it. If you can't open it you need to get an archiver which supports rar files such as Winrar and extract.

 .  you must have Adobe After Effects CC 12.2.0.52 Final Multilanguage [ChingLiu]


 . Close your internet connection IMPORTANT


 . Install application from "Adobe After Effects CC" ChingLiu's torrent by double clicking on the "Set-up.exe" (With admin rights on your system.)
  * CHECK "Install pictures" folder.


 . Choose TRY install. (If it shows your Adobe account, click on
    "not my account" option.) Select "Sign in Later"


 . Select your language. (You can not change it after installation)


 . Open application as trial and select "Continue trial" or "Connect Later"
    (IMPORTANT : If you miss this step, application may not be registered,
    don't worry if it says 00 expired, just close it.)


 . Install "AdobePatchInstaller.exe" in folder "AfterEffects_CC_12_1_upd"
  * CHECK "Install pictures" folder.


 . Install "AdobePatchInstaller.exe" in folder "AfterEffects_CC_12_2_1_ftr"
  * CHECK "Install pictures" folder.

 . a. Copy "Adobe.CC.Anticloud.exe" and paste it in to installation folder.
    It is generally:
    C:Program FilesAdobeAdobe After Effects CC


    b. Run "Adobe.CC.Anticloud.exe"
  * CHECK Patch.Steps.jpg in "Patch VR" folder.


  . Use your firewall to stop internet connection of the application.
    Don't update it. Some security software may warn you about patch VR
    it is clean. Tested.

Adobe Update Management Tool

is small tool that help you bypass the Adobe license checker so you can grab all updates from Adobe website without Creative Cloud account or license.

Functions:
- Download Offline update
- Install Offline update
- Install Online update
- Install Custom distribution

How to use:
Download Offline Update :
1. Run UMT -> Ã¢â‚¬Å“Download Offline UpdatesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½.
2. Specify a folder to download updates (Browse).
3. Get a list of updates (Get List).
4. Chose the update & download (Download).
If you copy the link to the clipboard or save to a file , then each update will be two : Adobe uses different names for the register files so that only one of the links will work.

Install Offline Update:
1. Adobe Products Required.
2. Offline download the necessary update . If you want, then extract it to a convenient location.
3. Run UMT -> Ã¢â‚¬Å“Install Offline UpdatesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ -> Specify the archive automatic update or automatic update installation file and run (Run).
After unpacking, setup will be run standalone installation of automatic update , if specified uncompressed update, will launch the update.
4 . The launcher can be closed.


Get & Install Online updates :
1. Run UMT -> Ã¢â‚¬Å“Get and Install Online UpdatesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½.
2. Specify the desired product , product IDs can be found on the links from the FAQ, if you are interested . In principle, can leave as default , this action only indicates the range or scope of application as practice shows AAM generally still.
3. Select language and run the update (Run).
